newsitem.title: USA: Cytogen gets okay for Quadramet for pain.
newsitem.headline: Cytogen gets okay for Quadramet for pain.

text.p: Cytogen Corp said Monday that it has received clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration to market Quadramet to treat the severe pain associated with cancers that have spread to bone.
The comapny said Quadramet will be commercially available during the second quarter of 1997.
